verses.verse: הִנָּ֨ךְ <S%H2005><s%> behold יָפָ֤ה <S%H3303><s%> Behold thou [art] fair רַעְיָתִי֙ <S%H7474><s%> my love הִנָּ֣ךְ <S%H2005><s%> behold יָפָ֔ה <S%H3303><s%> behold thou [art] fair עֵינַ֣יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> eyes יוֹנִ֔ים <S%H3123><s%> thou [hast] doves' מִבַּ֖עַד <S%H1157><s%> within לְצַמָּתֵ֑ךְ <S%H6777><s%> thy locks שַׂעְרֵךְ֙ <S%H8181><s%> thy hair כְּעֵ֣דֶר <S%H5739><s%> [is] as a flock הָֽעִזִּ֔ים <S%H5795><s%> of goats שֶׁגָּלְשׁ֖וּ <S%H1570><s%> that appear מֵהַ֥ר <S%H2022><s%> from mount גִּלְעָֽד׃ <S%H1568><s%> Gilead

שִׁנַּ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H8127><s%> Thy teeth כְּעֵ֣דֶר <S%H5739><s%> [are] like a flock הַקְּצוּב֔וֹת <S%H7094><s%> [of sheep that are even] shorn שֶׁעָל֖וּ <S%H5927><s%> which came up מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> up הָרַחְצָ֑ה <S%H7367><s%> from the washing שֶׁכֻּלָּם֙ <S%H3605><s%> All מַתְאִימ֔וֹת <S%H8382><s%> whereof every one bear twins וְשַׁכֻּלָ֖ה <S%H7909><s%> and none [is] barren אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> one בָּהֶֽם׃

כְּח֤וּט <S%H2339><s%> [are] like a thread הַשָּׁנִי֙ <S%H8144><s%> of scarlet שִׂפְתֹתַ֔יִךְ <S%H8193><s%> Thy lips וּמִדְבָּרֵ֖יךְ <S%H4057><s%> and thy speech נָאוֶ֑ה <S%H5000><s%> [is] comely כְּפֶ֤לַח <S%H6400><s%> [are] like a piece הָֽרִמּוֹן֙ <S%H7416><s%> of a pomegranate רַקָּתֵ֔ךְ <S%H7541><s%> thy temples מִבַּ֖עַד <S%H1157><s%> within לְצַמָּתֵֽךְ׃ <S%H6777><s%> thy locks

כְּמִגְדַּ֤ל <S%H4026><s%> [is] like the tower דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> of David צַוָּארֵ֔ךְ <S%H6677><s%> Thy neck בָּנ֖וּי <S%H1129><s%> builded לְתַלְפִּיּ֑וֹת <S%H8530><s%> for an armoury אֶ֤לֶף <S%H505><s%> a thousand הַמָּגֵן֙ <S%H4043><s%> bucklers תָּל֣וּי <S%H8518><s%> whereon there hang עָלָ֔יו <S%H5921><s%> and כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> All שִׁלְטֵ֥י <S%H7982><s%> all shields הַגִּבּוֹרִֽים׃ <S%H1368><s%> of mighty men

שְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> Thy two שָׁדַ֛יִךְ <S%H7699><s%> breasts כִּשְׁנֵ֥י <S%H8147><s%> [are] like two עֳפָרִ֖ים <S%H6082><s%> young תְּאוֹמֵ֣י <S%H8380><s%> that are twins צְבִיָּ֑ה <S%H6646><s%> roes הָרוֹעִ֖ים <S%H7462><s%> which feed בַּשּׁוֹשַׁנִּֽים׃ <S%H7799><s%> among the lilies

עַ֤ד <S%H5704><s%> Until שֶׁיָּפ֙וּחַ֙ <S%H6315><s%> break הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> Until the day וְנָ֖סוּ <S%H5127><s%> flee away הַצְּלָלִ֑ים <S%H6752><s%> and the shadows אֵ֤לֶךְ <S%H1980><s%> will go לִי֙ אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> to הַ֣ר <S%H2022><s%> me to the mountain הַמּ֔וֹר <S%H4753><s%> of myrrh וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> and to גִּבְעַ֖ת <S%H1389><s%> and to the hill הַלְּבוֹנָֽה׃ <S%H3828><s%> of frankincense
כֻּלָּ֤ךְ <S%H3605><s%> are altogether יָפָה֙ <S%H3303><s%> Thou [art] all fair רַעְיָתִ֔י <S%H7474><s%> my love וּמ֖וּם <S%H3971><s%> [there is] no spot אֵ֥ין <S%H369><s%> and there בָּֽךְ׃ ס

אִתִּ֤י <S%H854><s%> from מִלְּבָנוֹן֙ <S%H3844><s%> with me from Lebanon כַּלָּ֔ה <S%H3618><s%> [my] spouse אִתִּ֖י <S%H854><s%> from מִלְּבָנ֣וֹן <S%H3844><s%> with me from Lebanon תָּב֑וֹאִי <S%H935><s%> Come תָּשׁ֣וּרִי ׀ <S%H7789><s%> look מֵרֹ֣אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> from the top אֲמָנָ֗ה <S%H549><s%> of Amana מֵרֹ֤אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> from the top שְׂנִיר֙ <S%H8149><s%> of Shenir וְחֶרְמ֔וֹן <S%H2768><s%> and Hermon מִמְּעֹנ֣וֹת <S%H4585><s%> dens אֲרָי֔וֹת <S%H738><s%> from the lions' מֵֽהַרְרֵ֖י <S%H2042><s%> from the mountains נְמֵרִֽים׃ <S%H5246><s%> of the leopards

לִבַּבְתִּ֖נִי <S%H3823><s%> Thou hast ravished my heart אֲחֹתִ֣י <S%H269><s%> my sister כַלָּ֑ה <S%H3618><s%> [my] spouse לִבַּבְתִּ֙ינִי֙ <S%H3823><s%> thou hast ravished my heart [בְּאַחַד כ] (בְּאַחַ֣ת <S%H259><s%> A single ק) מֵעֵינַ֔יִךְ <S%H5869><s%> of thine eyes בְּאַחַ֥ד <S%H259><s%> with one עֲנָ֖ק <S%H6060><s%> chain מִצַּוְּרֹנָֽיִךְ׃ <S%H6677><s%> of thy neck

מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How יָּפ֥וּ <S%H3302><s%> How fair דֹדַ֖יִךְ <S%H1730><s%> is thy love אֲחֹתִ֣י <S%H269><s%> my sister כַלָּ֑ה <S%H3618><s%> [my] spouse מַה־ <S%H4100><s%> How טֹּ֤בוּ <S%H2895><s%> how much better דֹדַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H1730><s%> is thy love מִיַּ֔יִן <S%H3196><s%> than wine וְרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> and the smell שְׁמָנַ֖יִךְ <S%H8081><s%> of thine ointments מִכָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all בְּשָׂמִֽים׃ <S%H1314><s%> than all spices

נֹ֛פֶת <S%H5317><s%> [as] the honeycomb תִּטֹּ֥פְנָה <S%H5197><s%> drop שִׂפְתוֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H8193><s%> Thy lips כַּלָּ֑ה <S%H3618><s%> O [my] spouse דְּבַ֤שׁ <S%H1706><s%> honey וְחָלָב֙ <S%H2461><s%> and milk תַּ֣חַת <S%H8478><s%> are under לְשׁוֹנֵ֔ךְ <S%H3956><s%> [are] under thy tongue וְרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> and the smell שַׂלְמֹתַ֖יִךְ <S%H8008><s%> of thy garments כְּרֵ֥יחַ <S%H7381><s%> [is] like the smell לְבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> of Lebanon ס

גַּ֥ן ׀ <S%H1588><s%> A garden נָע֖וּל <S%H5274><s%> inclosed אֲחֹתִ֣י <S%H269><s%> [is] my sister כַלָּ֑ה <S%H3618><s%> [my] spouse גַּ֥ל <S%H1530><s%> a spring נָע֖וּל <S%H5274><s%> shut up מַעְיָ֥ן <S%H4599><s%> a fountain חָתֽוּם׃ <S%H2856><s%> sealed

שְׁלָחַ֙יִךְ֙ <S%H7973><s%> Thy plants פַּרְדֵּ֣ס <S%H6508><s%> [are] an orchard רִמּוֹנִ֔ים <S%H7416><s%> of pomegranates עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> with פְּרִ֣י <S%H6529><s%> fruits מְגָדִ֑ים <S%H4022><s%> with pleasant כְּפָרִ֖ים <S%H3724><s%> camphire עִם־ <S%H5973><s%> with נְרָדִֽים׃ <S%H5373><s%> with spikenard

נֵ֣רְדְּ ׀ <S%H5373><s%> Spikenard וְכַרְכֹּ֗ם <S%H3750><s%> and saffron קָנֶה֙ <S%H7070><s%> calamus וְקִנָּמ֔וֹן <S%H7076><s%> and cinnamon עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> along כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all עֲצֵ֣י <S%H6086><s%> with all trees לְבוֹנָ֑ה <S%H3828><s%> of frankincense מֹ֚ר <S%H4753><s%> myrrh וַאֲהָל֔וֹת <S%H174><s%> and aloes עִ֖ם <S%H5973><s%> along כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all רָאשֵׁ֥י <S%H7218><s%> with all the chief בְשָׂמִֽים׃ <S%H1314><s%> spices

מַעְיַ֣ן <S%H4599><s%> A fountain גַּנִּ֔ים <S%H1588><s%> of gardens בְּאֵ֖ר <S%H875><s%> a well מַ֣יִם <S%H4325><s%> waters חַיִּ֑ים <S%H2416><s%> of living וְנֹזְלִ֖ים <S%H5140><s%> and streams מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> at לְבָנֽוֹן׃ <S%H3844><s%> from Lebanon

ע֤וּרִי <S%H5782><s%> Awake צָפוֹן֙ <S%H6828><s%> O north wind וּב֣וֹאִי <S%H935><s%> and come תֵימָ֔ן <S%H8486><s%> thou south הָפִ֥יחִי <S%H6315><s%> blow גַנִּ֖י <S%H1588><s%> upon my garden יִזְּל֣וּ <S%H5140><s%> thereof may flow out בְשָׂמָ֑יו <S%H1314><s%> [that] the spices יָבֹ֤א <S%H935><s%> come דוֹדִי֙ <S%H1730><s%> Let my beloved לְגַנּ֔וֹ <S%H1588><s%> into his garden וְיֹאכַ֖ל <S%H398><s%> and eat פְּרִ֥י <S%H6529><s%> fruits מְגָדָֽיו׃ <S%H4022><s%> his pleasant
